attributes.action: Do Not Phase Out Alternate Fuel VED Discounts Under The New Proposed VED scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment currently gives alternate fuel drivers a 10% discount.

If the new VED proposal gets passed then 10% will disapear.

How can you justify this move. How is it a true green tax.

If the discount is phased out then the green thing to do, would be to tax the vehicles based on actual engine emissions after conversion. I hope this is not due to the increase in interest around LPG and other alternate fuels by the haulage industry.

So keep the discount or re-consider the tax bands for alternate fueled cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
